idea-plugin.name: yGuard Unscrambler
idea-plugin.description: Adds Unscrambler support for yGuard's mapping files
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 1.2.0 Smarter unscrambling of null pointer messages in some cases.
  • 1.1.1 Updated plugin info.
  • 1.0.0 Initial version for yGuard Unscrambler. Uses yGuard 4.0.0
